Literature.Title: Glycosylated Lipopeptides-Synthesis and Evaluation of Antimicrobial Activity and Cytotoxicity
Literature.Author: Sikora K, Bauer M, Bartoszewska S, Neubauer D, Kamysz W

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=5.16±1.32 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=111.45±11.65 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=256µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=256µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 15126(MIC=16µg/ml)
